original_text: You gave your people bread from heaven when they were hungry. You gave them water from a rock to drink when they were thirsty. You commanded them to go to the land that you had promised to give them. You told them to take it for themselves.
korean_text: 그들의 굶주림 때문에 그들에게 양식을 주시며 그들의 목마름 때문에 그들에게 반석에서 물을 내시고 또 주께서 옛적에 손을 들어 맹세하시고 주겠다고 하신 땅을 들어가서 차지하라 말씀하셨사오나

sentences.original_text: You gave your people bread from heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 당신의 백성에게 하늘의 빵을 주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: You gave them water from a rock to drink
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들에게 바위에서 나는 물을 마시게 하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: You commanded them to go to the land
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들이 그 땅으로 가라고 명령하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: that you had promised to give them
You told them to take it for themselves
